briefdescription.para: CPU Byte order. Assume little endian by default as this is the most common.
The platform/compiler has Standard C support.
Macro used to signal that a function parameter isn't used.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *file, int line, const char *func, const char *mesg)
memberdef.name: __gg_assert_func
